pkgmetadata.longdescription: AnsiLove is an ANSI and ASCII art to PNG converter, allowing to convert ANSI and artscene-related file formats into PNG images, supporting ANSI (.ANS), PCBoard (.PCB), Binary (.BIN), Artworx (.ADF), iCE Draw (.IDF), Tundra (.TND) and XBin (.XB) formats. It creates size optimized 4-bit PNG files and supports SAUCE (Standard Architecture for Universal Comment Extensions), 80x25 and 80x50 PC fonts (including all the 14 MS-DOS charsets), Amiga fonts, and iCE colors. This is a complete rewrite of AnsiLove/PHP in the C programming language.
